name: 邓婧
wishText: 愿这完全属于你的一天带给你快乐，愿未来的日子锦上添花! ;)
textInChatBox: I wish you a happy birthday and every day of your life.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: 愿你有一个灿烂的前程，愿你有情人终成眷属，愿你在尘世获得幸福。
